values.value: Makes an authenticated HTTP callout to an external REST API using a Named Credential

[ { "name": "namedCredential", "type": "string", "required": true, "help": "API name of the Salesforce Named Credential to use (e.g., \"My_External_API\"). The Named Credential supplies the base URL and handles all authentication — credentials are never exposed to the LLM.", "label": "Named Credential", "placeholder": "My_External_API" }, { "name": "endpoint", "type": "string", "required": true, "help": "Relative path appended to the Named Credential base URL. Supports {placeholder} tokens that the LLM fills at runtime via pathVariables (e.g., \"/v1/cases/{caseId}/comments\"). Must start with \"/\".", "label": "Endpoint Path", "placeholder": "/api/v1/cases/{caseId}" }, { "name": "method", "type": "string", "required": true, "help": "HTTP verb for this capability. GET and DELETE ignore the body parameter; POST, PUT, and PATCH accept a JSON body from the LLM.", "label": "HTTP Method", "picklistValues": [ "GET", "POST", "PUT", "PATCH", "DELETE" ] }, { "name": "headers", "type": "object", "required": false, "help": "Static headers sent with every request as a JSON object (e.g., {\"Accept\": \"application/json\", \"X-Api-Version\": \"2.0\"}). Authentication headers come from the Named Credential automatically. Content-Type defaults to \"application/json\" for body-bearing methods if not set here.", "label": "Request Headers" }, { "name": "staticQueryParams", "type": "object", "required": false, "help": "Key-value query parameters always appended to the URL as a JSON object (e.g., {\"api_version\": \"2.0\", \"format\": \"json\"}). Merged with any queryParams the LLM provides at runtime.", "label": "Static Query Parameters" }, { "name": "timeout", "type": "integer", "required": false, "help": "Request timeout in milliseconds. Default 10000 (10 s), maximum 120000 (120 s).", "label": "Timeout (ms)", "minValue": 1, "maxValue": 120000 } ]
